attributes.action: Either change the rules about Photo Driving Licenses only needing to be renewed when appearance changes or replace them at 10 years for free - Another Stealth Tax is about to strike!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government have introduced Photo Driving Licences and imposed a manadatory 10 year replacement rule. No problem except it will cost each and every driver to have it replaced. There is no choice You cannot now obtain a non photo license
